doc.field:
This layer contains data for the companies that have been issued an Industrial Discharge Permit by the Industrial Waste & Pollution Prevention Section of the Metropolitan Council Environmental Services Division. MCES is delegated as the Control Authority to regulate the use of the public sanitary sewer system within the MCES seven county service area. Companies are issued an Industrial Discharge Permit if they are determined to have a significant impact on the public sewer system. These data also include permitted facilities outside of the seven county service area that hold a permit with MCES. These permits are for wastewater hauled into the service area.
More information about the industrial waste program of the Metropolitan Council's Environmental Services Division can be found at http://www.metrocouncil.org/environment/IndustrialWaste/index.htm .

MCES is delegated as the Control Authority to regulate the use of the public sanitary sewer system within the MCES seven county service area. Companies are issued an Industrial Discharge Permit if they are determined to have a significant impact on the public sewer system. These data also include permitted facilities outside of the seven county service area that hold a permit with MCES. These permits are for wastewater hauled into the service area.
More information about the industrial waste program of the Metropolitan Council's Environmental Services Division can be found at http://www.metrocouncil.org/environment/IndustrialWaste/index.htm Paul</city><state>Minnesota</state><postal>55101-1805</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice>651-602-4705</cntvoice><cntfax>651-602-4730</cntfax><cntemail>bob.golden@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail></cntinfo></ptcontac></idinfo><dataqual><attracc><attraccr>No formal assessment of the attribute accuracy has been made. Some missing and inaccurate data is known to exist in the following fields: - COUNTY - CATEGORY - ZIP</attraccr></attracc><logic>The dataset is topologically 'clean'.</logic><complete>Entire state is covered, although relatively few points exist beyond the seven county metro area.
See attribute accuracy for issues related to attribute completeness.</complete><posacc><horizpa><horizpar>The positional accuracy of the dataset has not been tested under the National Standards for Spatial Data Accuracy.
Most of the points were established using a Trimble ProXR GPS, Model TSC1PN. Typically a technician took a reading from the parking lot of the permitted facility. In the situation where a GPS position has not been taken or it could not be obtained due to interference, a feature was added to the layer via heads-up digitizing using the Metropolitan Council's year 2000 ortho photos.</horizpar></horizpa></posacc><lineage><srcinfo><srcscale /></srcinfo><procstep><procdesc>Most of the points were established using a Trimble ProXR GPS, Model TSC1PN. Typically a technician took a reading from the parking lot of the permitted facility. In the situation where a GPS position has not been taken or it could not be obtained due to interference, a feature was added to the layer via heads-up digitizing using the Metropolitan Council's year 2000 ortho photos.</procdesc></procstep></lineage></dataqual><spdoinfo><indspref>None</indspref><direct>Point</direct><mgmg3obj>point shapes</mgmg3obj><mgmg3til>One layer for entire state.</mgmg3til></spdoinfo><eainfo><overview><eaover>Point Attributes:
GPS_DATE: Date a GPS location was taken or when the point was added to the layer.
SOURCE: GPS or MAP, GPS = An actual GPS location, MAP= Point was placed on the layer using 2001 Ortho photos.
PERMITTXT: Industrial Discharge Permit Number issued by MCES. Permit numbers above 2000 are for Permittees that are discharging either Leachate or Contaminated Groundwater to the sanitary sewer system.
COMPNAME: Permittee's Name
FACADDRESS: Permitee's street address
COMMUNITY: Permitee's community/city location
COUNTY: County in which Permittee resides
ZIP: Permitee's Zip code
WWTP: The Waste Water Treatment Plant into which the Permittee discharges
CATEGORY: The main industrial category under which the facility falls
EPACAT1: USEPA Category under which the facility falls. Not all Permittee's fall under an EPA Category
SIU: Significant Industrial User, an USEPA designation given a Permittee depending on several criteria. SIU = 1, Non SIU = 0, EPA requires MCES to monitor and inspect each SIUs at least once per year.
SIC_CODE: Standard Industrial Classification Code, the main SIC Code under which the facility falls
REPT_FREQY: Number of times a Permittee submits an Industrial Discharge Report to the MCES. 1 = Annual, 2 = Semi-Annual, 4 = Quarterly</eaover><eadetcit>None</eadetcit></overview></eainfo><distinfo><resdesc>MCESIndustrialDischargePermits</resdesc><distliab>NOTICE The Geographic Information System (GIS) Data to which this notice is attached are made available pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13). THE GIS DATA ARE PROVIDED TO YOU AS IS AND WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY AS TO THEIR PERFORMANCE, MERCHANTABILITY, OR FITNESS FOR ANY PARTICULAR PURPOSE. The GIS Data were developed by the Metropolitan Council for its own internal business purposes. The Metropolitan Council does not represent or warrant that the GIS Data or the data documentation are error-free, complete, current, or accurate. You are responsible for any consequences resulting from your use of the GIS Data or your reliance on the GIS Data. You should consult the data documentation for this particular GIS Data to determine the limitations of the GIS Data and the precision with which the GIS Data may depict distance, direction, location, or other geographic features. If you transmit or provide the GIS Data (or any portion of it) to another user, it is recommended that the GIS Data include a copy of this disclaimer and this metadata.</distliab><stdorder><digform><digtinfo><formname>ArcView Shape file</formname><formvern>ArcGIS 8x</formvern><transize>Less than 1 MB for zip file.</transize></digtinfo></digform><ordering>This dataset is distributed on the internet by clicking below after 'Online Linkage'. Doing so will tell your browser to download a 'ZIP' file which will contain the following:
- ArcView shape files - metadata for the dataset (.htm) - NOTICE.RTF, an important notice about this dataset that can be read by any word processing software.
Additionally, this dataset is available for direct use via one or more map services. More information about what a web mapping service is can be found at http://www.datafinder.org/services/. The specific map service and layer name for this dataset can be found by clicking the blue or green boxes under the map service column of the DataFinder Catalog at http://www.datafinder.org/catalog/ .</ordering></stdorder><distrib><cntinfo><cntperp><cntorg>Metropolitan Council</cntorg><cntper>Jon Hoekenga</cntper></cntperp><cntpos>GIS System Administrator</cntpos><cntaddr><address>390 Robert Street North</address><city>St. Paul</city><state>MN</state><postal>55101-1805</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice>651.602.1561</cntvoice><cntemail>jonathan.hoekenga@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail></cntinfo></distrib></distinfo><metainfo><metd>20020327</metd><metstdn>Minnesota Geographic Metadata Guidelines</metstdn><metstdv>1.2</metstdv><metextns><onlink>http://www.gis.state.mn.us/stds/metadata.htm</onlink></metextns><metc><cntinfo><cntperp><cntorg>Metropolitan Council Environmental Services</cntorg><cntper>Bob Golden</cntper></cntperp><cntpos>Principal Engineer</cntpos><cntaddr><addrtype> mailing and physical address </addrtype><address>390 Robert Street North</address><city>St. Paul</city><state>Minnesota</state><postal>55101-1805</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice>651-602-4705</cntvoice><cntfax>651-602-4730</cntfax><cntemail>bob.golden@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail></cntinfo></metc></metainfo><Esri><ModDate>20040826</ModDate><ModTime>15261100</ModTime></Esri><mdDateSt Sync="TRUE">20040826</mdDateSt><spref><horizsys><planar><gridsys><gridsysn>Universal Transverse Mercator</gridsysn><utm><utmzone>15</utmzone></utm></gridsys><planci><plandu>meters</plandu></planci></planar><geodetic><horizdn>NAD83</horizdn><ellips>GRS80</ellips></geodetic></horizsys></spref></metadata>
